message.content: The document appears to be a guide or manual for a library or software called Prism, which provides an interface for generating text using Large Language Models (LLMs). It covers basic usage, advanced features, error handling, and response handling. The guide includes code examples in PHP, which use the Prism library to generate text, maintain context for interactive conversations, set system prompts, and handle responses. The document also mentions various generation parameters and provides information on error handling.
